languages.text: "За высокомерие и предательство хора я приговариваю тебя!"
"I find you guilty of arrogance and betrayal of your Choir! You will be sentenced!"
languages.original_text: "За высокомерие и предательство хора я приговариваю тебя!"

traits.locale_text: "I find you guilty of arrogance and betrayal of your choir! You will be sentenced!"
"I find you guilty of arrogance and betrayal of your choir! You will be sentenced!"
"I find you guilty of arrogance and betrayal of your choir! You will be sentenced!"
"I find you guilty of arrogance and betrayal of your choir! You will be sentenced!"
"I find you guilty of arrogance and betrayal of your Choir! You will be sentenced!"
"I find you guilty of arrogance and betrayal of your Choir! You will be sentenced!"

languages.text: «¡Te declaro culpable de arrogancia y traición a tu Coro! ¡Recibirás tu castigo!».
languages.original_text: "I find you guilty of arrogance and betrayal of your Choir! You will be sentenced!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Te declaro culpable de arrogancia y traición a tu Coro! ¡Recibirás tu castigo!».

languages.text: 「あなたの聖歌隊の傲慢と裏切り…それは間違いなく罪だ！あなたには判決が下る！」
languages.original_text: "I find you guilty of arrogance and betrayal of your Choir! You will be sentenced!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの聖歌隊の傲慢と裏切り…それは間違いなく罪だ！あなたには判決が下る！」

languages.text: “你犯下了傲慢的大罪，还背叛了星语唱诗班！你一定会遭到审判！”
languages.original_text: "I find you guilty of arrogance and betrayal of your Choir! You will be sentenced!"

traits.locale_text: “你犯下了傲慢的大罪，还背叛了星语唱诗班！你一定会遭到审判！”

languages.text: "Ich befinde Euch schuldig der Arroganz und des Verrats an Eurem Chor! Ihr werdet verurteilt werden!"
languages.original_text: "I find you guilty of arrogance and betrayal of your Choir! You will be sentenced!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich befinde Euch schuldig der Arroganz und des Verrats an Eurem Chor! Ihr werdet verurteilt werden!"

languages.text: « Je vous déclare coupable d'arrogance et de trahison envers votre chœur ! Vous serez condamné ! »
languages.original_text: "I find you guilty of arrogance and betrayal of your Choir! You will be sentenced!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous déclare coupable d'arrogance et de trahison envers votre chœur ! Vous serez condamné ! »

languages.text: "Seni küstahlık ve Koro'ya ihanetten suçlu buluyorum! Cezasını çekeceksin!"
languages.original_text: "I find you guilty of arrogance and betrayal of your Choir! You will be sentenced!"
